game.name: Streamers Cleaning Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Restore order and cleanliness to the rooms of famous Gaming Streamers after their epic gaming sessions. Find artefacts, explore streamers life. Play co-op with your friends.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Restore order and cleanliness to the rooms of famous Gaming Streamers after their epic gaming sessions. Find artefacts, explore streamers life. Play co-op with your friends.
